text: “Ezɨ kɨ adarir akar ia gasir mabar ia mɨkɨmasa. Ian tongɨn gumazamizir maba iti, me Balamɨn suren akabar suiragha gavgavighavɨra iti. Fomɨra Balam kamaghɨn Balakɨn sure gami, eghtɨ a tuavir kuramɨn Israelian akakagh me damutɨ, me arazir kuramɨn iregham. Ezɨ Balak Israelian nɨghnɨzibagh amizɨma, me aseba bagha ofa gamir asɨziba apa, egha tintinibar uari koma akuir arazim gami.
